Package rover

Class Grabber

java.lang.Object
rover.Grabber
class Grabber
extends java.lang.Object
A wrapper class to make the use of the pliers of the rover easier. It essentially takes care of the movements of the motor needed to open and close the pliers.
Author:
Antoine Stevan

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Engine motor
    The motor controlled by the rover to actuate the pliers.
    (package private) int motor_speed
    The given speed of the motor controlling the pliers, in degrees per second.
    (package private) int pliers_opening_angle
    The total opening of the motor controlling the pliers, in degrees.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Grabber​(lejos.hardware.port.Port port)
    Constructor for any Grabber instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) boolean connect()
    A wrapper method to connect the motor allocated to the pliers and the brick.
    (package private) int getTachoCount()
    A tool wrapper of the Encoder.getTachoCount() method to get the tacho count of the motor allocated to the pliers.
    void grab()
    Makes the pliers close to grab anything in front of the rover.
    (package private) boolean isMoving()
    A tool wrapper of the BaseMotor.isMoving() method to know if the pliers are currently moving.
    void release()
    Makes the pliers open to release anything that was inside the pliers.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • motor

      Engine motor
      The motor controlled by the rover to actuate the pliers.

    • motor_speed

      final int motor_speed
      The given speed of the motor controlling the pliers, in degrees per second.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • pliers_opening_angle

      final int pliers_opening_angle
      The total opening of the motor controlling the pliers, in degrees.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Grabber

      Grabber​(lejos.hardware.port.Port port)
      Constructor for any Grabber instance. A Grabber only needs a port to connect to the brick.
      Parameters:
      port - the port needed to connect the brick and the motor allocated to the pliers.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      boolean connect()
      A wrapper method to connect the motor allocated to the pliers and the brick. Simply calls the Engine.connect() method.
      Returns:
      a boolean telling whether the connection has been successful or not.

    • getTachoCount

      int getTachoCount()
      A tool wrapper of the Encoder.getTachoCount() method to get the tacho count of the motor allocated to the pliers.
      Returns:
      the integer tacho count of the motor, in degrees.

    • isMoving

      boolean isMoving()
      A tool wrapper of the BaseMotor.isMoving() method to know if the pliers are currently moving.
      Returns:
      a boolean telling whether the pliers are currently moving or not.

    • grab

      public void grab()
      Makes the pliers close to grab anything in front of the rover.

    • release

      public void release()
      Makes the pliers open to release anything that was inside the pliers.
